column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''25''' is the twenty-fifth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "From the ''Mortale Valinoreva''" — trans. by [[Patrick H. Wynne]].
* "The Subscript Dot: A New ''Tehta'' Usage" — [[Arden R. Smith]].
* "An Adunaic Dictionary" — [[Carl F. Hostetter]] and Patrick Wynne.
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
